snippet.title: How I learned to Skate - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
How I learned to Skate is a purposefully difficult game where you control the individual legs and body tilt of an ice-skater. Skating through an increasingly burdensome path. It is all about mastering the ice-skating mechanic.

Steam store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1370690/How_I_learned_to_Skate/

This is a game born out of love for immensely hard challenge games, such as Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy and Jump King. The main inspiration being a Warcraft 3 mod, Polar Escape IV.
